findings.title: Wrong import of OpenZeppelin library
findings.description: In the current implementation, OpenZeppelin files are added to the repo, which violates OpenZeppelinâ€™s MIT license.

findings.title: Improved Logic in getMultiplier
findings.description: The function getMultiplier takes two arguments and calculates the reward multiplier for the given block range, but does not take into account the initial block (startBlock) from which the incentive rewards start to apply.

findings.title: Missing natspec documentation
findings.description: Solidity contracts can use a special form of comments to provide rich documentation for functions, return variables and more.
